title: Living way out
creator_credit: Film Australia, Malcolm Otton and Philip Robertson
brief_description: Depicts life in Shay Gap, a remote mining town in Western Australia. Residents and a social planner speak of the problems of isolation - stress, boredom and loneliness - and how they attempt to resolve them.
